summary: This is a patch for Brigandage and Requiem (old and new versions), with support for Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified and Crafting Overhaul Reqtified.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][center]Version 1.0 is for REQUIEM 1.9.4
Version 2.0 is for REQUIEM 2.0.1
The patch for REQUIEM 2.0.2 is planned[/center][/size][/b]
[b][size=3]Requirements[/size][/b]
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32706]Brigandage[/url]﻿ - version 4
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]﻿ - version 1.9.4.1 ([i]patch version 1.0[/i]) or version 2.0.1 ([i]patch version 2.0[/i])
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61520]KFR - Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified[/url]﻿﻿ - version 2.0.1b3 ([i]patch version 1.0[/i]) or version 2.1b5 ([i]patch version 2.0[/i])
[/list]
Strongly suggested (not a hard requirement): [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61569]COR - Crafting Overhaul Reqtified[/url] - version 2.0.1b3 ([i]patch version 1.0[/i]) or version 2.1b3 ([i]patch version 2.0[/i])

[i]Note:[/i] KFR is required because of the reqtification of the leveled lists. If it wasn't required it would still be strongly suggested like COR is.

[size=3][b]Installation
[/b][/size]When you install Brigandage, make sure to deactivate, or actually delete, the original Brigandage.esp, because this patch replaces that ESP with one with a different name (Requiem - Brigandage.esp).

[b][size=3]Load order[/size][/b]
Load this patch anywhere after Requiem, KFR and COR:

Dawnguard DLC
Hearthfire DLC
Dragonborn DLC
Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch
[other mods]
Requiem
[other Requiem mods]
KFR - Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified
COR - Crafting Overhaul Reqtified
[other Requiem mods]
Requiem - Brigandage Patch (this patch)
[other Requiem mods]
Reqtificator patch (remember to run the Reqtificator after installing or updating this patch)

[size=3][b]Description of the patch
[/b][/size]This patch is based on the "craftable + leveled lists" version of the Brigandage mod. A patch was originally made by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9435783]ANoodInDisguise[/url]﻿, who adjusted stats and recipes and used Requiem's leveled lists instead of vanilla ones to integrate Brigandage armors into the game.
The improvements to that patch and to the original mod include: fixed typos and improved names, balanced stats based on KFR's standards, improved crafting recipes based on COR's standards and added generic Fur Plates alternate crafting recipes.
Stats and keywords are based on the look of the armors, the goal is to achieve a balanced and realistic result, that provides consistency with the recipes requirements and stats and keywords of the vanilla reqtified armors.

[size=3][b]Bugs[/b][/size]
Bugs that the patch COULD cause:
[list]
[*]balance issues (I did my best to make sure the armors stats make sense, but there's always room for improvements)
[*]typos and errors (there's always a chance I missed something)
[/list]
[b][size=3]Credits and thanks
[/size][/b]Credit and thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4122606]FranklinZunge[/url]﻿ for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32706]Brigandage[/url]﻿
Credit and thanks to the Requiem team for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]﻿
Credit and thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9435783]ANoobInDisguise[/url] for the original patch
Disclaimer: this patch is just an ESP that is a modification of the original, it doesn't include any of the assets not made by FranklinZunge, whose authors are credited in the Brigandage mod's page: northborn (nbfurhoods textures), hothtrooper (chainmail texture), defunkt (chainmail texture), lordofwar (witcher 2 meshes port), amidianborn (textures), Bethesda (vanilla meshes and textures)
author: GOsteW

files.name: Requiem 1.9.4 - Brigandage Patch
files.changelogHtml: The patch adapts the armors (stats and keywords) and the recipes to Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified and Crafting Overhaul Reqtified, fixes some typos and improves the armors' names and adds support for Crafting Overhaul's generic Fur Plate recipes. The stats are edited based on the look of the armor.
